message.sky_accessories.god_command_disa: §cDivine authority has been disabled by server configuration.
message.sky_accessories.god_say_disabled: §cDivine broadcast has been disabled by server configuration.
message.sky_accessories.not_god: §cYou are not the Sovereign of Heaven. Only the chosen may wield divine power.
message.sky_accessories.throne_bound: §dThe Heavenly Throne has recognized you as its Sovereign.
message.sky_accessories.already_god: §dYou are already the Sovereign of this realm.
message.sky_accessories.throne_taken: §cThe Heavenly Throne is already claimed by another.
message.sky_accessories.cannot_teleport_: §cThe Sovereign of Heaven cannot be forcibly displaced!
message.sky_accessories.auto_equipped_go: §aThe Godhood has been automatically attuned to you.
message.sky_accessories.non_owner_fate_p: §cYou are not the Sovereign; §dFate§c has been purged.
gui.sky_accessories.travel.title: Throne Travel
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.desc1: Become the Sovereign; all realms bow to your will.
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.desc2: Use GUI to traverse any dimension; forced teleports are blocked.
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.mechanism.a: All forced teleports are blocked for the Sovereign
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.mechanism.d: Absolute defense: cancels any damage below 1e18; caps at 1
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.debug.title: Debug
message.sky_accessories.give_blocked: The Heavenly Throne cannot be obtained via /give.
message.sky_accessories.curios_clear_blo: Curios clear is resisted by the Emperor.
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.lore2: Bound to one, eternal and unique.
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.mechanics.d: Absolute Defense: <1e18 dmg ignored, others capped to 1.
tooltip.sky_accessories.fate.mechanics.s: Gaze suppresses target’s equips and curios.
